mapper.insert: insert into review(user_id, movie_id, rating, review) values(#{userId}, #{movieId}, #{rating}, #{review})
mapper.update: update review set rating=#{rating}, review=#{review}, recommend=#{recommend} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from likes where review_id=#{reviewId} and user_id=#{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from likes where review_id=#{reviewId} and user_id=#{userId}
mapper.update: update review set spoiler=#{spoiler} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from review where spoiler > 0 order by asc
